item.title: Coyotes cause concern for local homeowner after killing her cats

item.title: Man dies after riding roller coaster at new Florida theme park Epic Universe
item.description: A patron at one of the nation’s newest amusement parks has died after riding a roller coaster there, Florida authorities said.
